ingredients.content: ½ oz extra virgin olive oil
11 oz pak choi or other green vegetables, cut into strips (see Tip)

preparations.content: Place garlic and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add pak choi, salt and pepper and stir-fry <b>5 min/250°F//speed <b>. Serve immediately.
